widgets.title: System Load
widgets.nrql: FROM Metric SELECT sum(datadog.system.load.1), sum(datadog.system.load.5), sum(datadog.system.load.15) SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES COMPARE WITH 7 days ago

widgets.title: System Memory
widgets.nrql: FROM Metric SELECT sum(datadog.system.mem.usable), sum(datadog.system.mem.total) - sum(datadog.system.mem.usable) SINCE 1 day ago COMPARE WITH 7 days ago TIMESERIES

widgets.title: CPU Usage
widgets.nrql: FROM Metric SELECT sum(datadog.system.cpu.idle), sum(datadog.system.cpu.system), sum(datadog.system.cpu.iowait), sum(datadog.system.cpu.user), sum(datadog.system.cpu.stolen), sum(datadog.system.cpu.guest) SINCE 1 day ago COMPARE WITH 7 days ago TIMESERIES
